Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Title: The Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Andrew Lincoln, , Norman Reedus, , Melissa McBride, , Lauren Cohan
Synopsis: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

Title: The Mother
Cast: Director:, Niki Caro, | ,     Stars:, Jennifer Lopez, , Lucy Paez, , Omari Hardwick, , Joseph Fiennes
Synopsis: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon

Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan
Cast: Stars:, John Krasinski, , Wendell Pierce, , Michael Kelly, , Abbie Cornish
Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon

Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise

Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: To Catch a Killer
Cast: Director:, Damián Szifron, | ,     Stars:, Shailene Woodley, , Ben Mendelsohn, , Jovan Adepo, , Ralph Ineson
Synopsis: Baltimore. New Year's Eve. A talented but troubled police officer (Shailene Woodley) is recruited by the FBI's chief investigator (Ben Mendelsohn) to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorizing the city.

Title: Missing
Cast: Directors:, Nicholas D. Johnson, , Will Merrick, | ,     Stars:, Tim Griffin, , Ava Zaria Lee, , Nia Long, , Kimberly Cheng
Synopsis: After her mother goes missing, a young woman tries to find her from home, using tools available to her online.

Title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
Cast: Stars:, Mariska Hargitay, , Christopher Meloni, , Ice-T, , Dann Florek
Synopsis: This series follows the Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of detectives in the New York City Police Department that investigate sexually related crimes.

Title: NCIS
Cast: Stars:, David McCallum, , Sean Murray, , Mark Harmon, , Brian Dietzen
Synopsis: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team.

Title: True Detective
Cast: Stars:, Vince Vaughn, , Colin Farrell, , Rachel McAdams, , Taylor Kitsch
Synopsis: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

Title: X
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , Jenna Ortega, , Brittany Snow, , Kid Cudi
Synopsis: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

Title: Kandahar
Cast: Director:, Ric Roman Waugh, | ,     Stars:, Gerard Butler, , Navid Negahban, , Ali Fazal, , Bahador Foladi
Synopsis: A CIA operative and his translator flee from special forces in Afghanistan after exposing a covert mission.

Title: Old
Cast: Director:, M. Night Shyamalan, | ,     Stars:, Gael García Bernal, , Vicky Krieps, , Rufus Sewell, , Alex Wolff
Synopsis: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Title: Criminal Minds
Cast: Stars:, Kirsten Vangsness, , Matthew Gray Gubler, , A.J. Cook, , Joe Mantegna
Synopsis: A group of criminal profilers who work for the FBI as members of its Behavioral Analysis Unit (BAU) using behavioral analysis and profiling to help investigate crimes and find the suspect known as the unsub.

Title: Anatomy of a Fall
Cast: Director:, Justine Triet, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Swann Arlaud, , Milo Machado Graner, , Antoine Reinartz
Synopsis: A woman is suspected of her husband's murder, and their blind son faces a moral dilemma as the sole witness.

Title: The Clearing
Cast: Stars:, Teresa Palmer, , Guy Pearce, , Erroll Shand, , Anna Lise Phillips
Synopsis: A woman is forced to confront the nightmares of her past in order to stop a secret cult intent on gathering children to fulfil its master plan.

Title: Fear the Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Kim Dickens, , Frank Dillane, , Cliff Curtis, , Rubén Blades
Synopsis: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

Title: F9: The Fast Saga
Cast: Director:, Justin Lin, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jordana Brewster, , Tyrese Gibson
Synopsis: Dom and the crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother.

Title: Scream VI
Cast: Directors:, Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, , Tyler Gillett, | ,     Stars:, Courteney Cox, , Melissa Barrera, , Jenna Ortega, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.

Title: The Wire
Cast: Stars:, Dominic West, , Lance Reddick, , Sonja Sohn, , Wendell Pierce
Synopsis: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Severance
Cast: Stars:, Adam Scott, , Zach Cherry, , Britt Lower, , Tramell Tillman
Synopsis: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

Title: Influencer
Cast: Director:, Kurtis David Harder, | ,     Stars:, Emily Tennant, , Rory J Saper, , Cassandra Naud, , Justin Sams
Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: The Last Thing He Told Me
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Garner, , Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, , Angourie Rice, , Aisha Tyler
Synopsis: A woman forms an unexpected relationship with her 16-year-old stepdaughter while searching for the truth about why her husband has mysteriously disappeared.

Title: Inside Man
Cast: Stars:, David Tennant, , Stanley Tucci, , Dolly Wells, , Lydia West
Synopsis: A prisoner on death row in the US and a woman trapped in a cellar under an English vicarage, cross paths in the most unexpected way.

Title: FUBAR
Cast: Stars:, Arnold Schwarzenegger, , Monica Barbaro, , Milan Carter, , Gabriel Luna
Synopsis: A C.I.A. operative on the edge of retirement discovers a family secret and is called back into the field for one last job.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Cast: Director:, Chad Stahelski, | ,     Stars:, Keanu Reeves, , Laurence Fishburne, , George Georgiou, , Lance Reddick
Synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Fast X
Cast: Director:, Louis Leterrier, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jason Statham, , Jordana Brewster
Synopsis: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

Title: Yellowjackets
Cast: Stars:, Melanie Lynskey, , Tawny Cypress, , Sophie Nélisse, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Canadian wilderness.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: Love & Death
Cast: Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jesse Plemons, , Lily Rabe, , Patrick Fugit
Synopsis: Two churchgoing couples enjoy small town family life in Texas - until somebody picks up an axe.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Citadel
Cast: Stars:, Richard Madden, , Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Stanley Tucci, , Ashleigh Cummings
Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Title: Black Mirror
Cast: Stars:, Daniel Lapaine, , Hannah John-Kamen, , Michaela Coel, , Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Title: Hypnotic
Cast: Director:, Robert Rodriguez, | ,     Stars:, Ben Affleck, , Alice Braga, , JD Pardo, , Dayo Okeniyi
Synopsis: A detective investigates a mystery involving his missing daughter and a secret government program.

Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: The Covenant
Cast: Director:, Guy Ritchie, | ,     Stars:, Jake Gyllenhaal, , Dar Salim, , Sean Sagar, , Jason Wong
Synopsis: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: The Boogeyman
Cast: Director:, Rob Savage, | ,     Stars:, Sophie Thatcher, , Chris Messina, , Vivien Lyra Blair, , David Dastmalchian
Synopsis: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

Title: Breaking Bad
Cast: Stars:, Bryan Cranston, , Aaron Paul, , Anna Gunn, , Betsy Brandt
Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Title: The Diplomat
Cast: Stars:, Keri Russell, , Rufus Sewell, , David Gyasi, , Ali Ahn
Synopsis: In the midst of an international crisis, Kate Wyler, a career diplomat, lands in a high-profile job for which she is not suited, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

Cast: Stars:, James Spader, , Megan Boone, , Diego Klattenhoff, , Ryan Eggold
Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Synopsis: In the midst of an international crisis, Kate Wyler, a career diplomat, lands in a high-profile job for which she is not suited, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Synopsis: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.

Title: The Wire
Cast: Stars:, Dominic West, , Lance Reddick, , Sonja Sohn, , Wendell Pierce
Synopsis: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Severance
Cast: Stars:, Adam Scott, , Zach Cherry, , Britt Lower, , Tramell Tillman
Synopsis: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

Title: Influencer
Cast: Director:, Kurtis David Harder, | ,     Stars:, Emily Tennant, , Rory J Saper, , Cassandra Naud, , Justin Sams
Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: The Last Thing He Told Me
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Garner, , Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, , Angourie Rice, , Aisha Tyler
Synopsis: A woman forms an unexpected relationship with her 16-year-old stepdaughter while searching for the truth about why her husband has mysteriously disappeared.

Title: Inside Man
Cast: Stars:, David Tennant, , Stanley Tucci, , Dolly Wells, , Lydia West
Synopsis: A prisoner on death row in the US and a woman trapped in a cellar under an English vicarage, cross paths in the most unexpected way.

Title: FUBAR
Cast: Stars:, Arnold Schwarzenegger, , Monica Barbaro, , Milan Carter, , Gabriel Luna
Synopsis: A C.I.A. operative on the edge of retirement discovers a family secret and is called back into the field for one last job.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Cast: Director:, Chad Stahelski, | ,     Stars:, Keanu Reeves, , Laurence Fishburne, , George Georgiou, , Lance Reddick
Synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Fast X
Cast: Director:, Louis Leterrier, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jason Statham, , Jordana Brewster
Synopsis: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

Title: Yellowjackets
Cast: Stars:, Melanie Lynskey, , Tawny Cypress, , Sophie Nélisse, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Canadian wilderness.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: Love & Death
Cast: Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jesse Plemons, , Lily Rabe, , Patrick Fugit
Synopsis: Two churchgoing couples enjoy small town family life in Texas - until somebody picks up an axe.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Citadel
Cast: Stars:, Richard Madden, , Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Stanley Tucci, , Ashleigh Cummings
Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Title: Black Mirror
Cast: Stars:, Daniel Lapaine, , Hannah John-Kamen, , Michaela Coel, , Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Title: Hypnotic
Cast: Director:, Robert Rodriguez, | ,     Stars:, Ben Affleck, , Alice Braga, , JD Pardo, , Dayo Okeniyi
Synopsis: A detective investigates a mystery involving his missing daughter and a secret government program.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: The Covenant
Cast: Director:, Guy Ritchie, | ,     Stars:, Jake Gyllenhaal, , Dar Salim, , Sean Sagar, , Jason Wong
Synopsis: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: The Boogeyman
Cast: Director:, Rob Savage, | ,     Stars:, Sophie Thatcher, , Chris Messina, , Vivien Lyra Blair, , David Dastmalchian
Synopsis: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

Title: Breaking Bad
Cast: Stars:, Bryan Cranston, , Aaron Paul, , Anna Gunn, , Betsy Brandt
Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Title: The Diplomat
Cast: Stars:, Keri Russell, , Rufus Sewell, , David Gyasi, , Ali Ahn
Synopsis: In the midst of an international crisis, Kate Wyler, a career diplomat, lands in a high-profile job for which she is not suited, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

Title: The Blacklist
Cast: Stars:, James Spader, , Megan Boone, , Diego Klattenhoff, , Ryan Eggold
Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Title: The Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Andrew Lincoln, , Norman Reedus, , Melissa McBride, , Lauren Cohan
Synopsis: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

Title: The Mother
Cast: Director:, Niki Caro, | ,     Stars:, Jennifer Lopez, , Lucy Paez, , Omari Hardwick, , Joseph Fiennes
Synopsis: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon
Cast: Director:, Adrian Grunberg, | ,     Stars:, Omar Chaparro, , Bolivar Sanchez, , Carlos Solórzano, , Josh Lucas
Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Cast: Stars:, Shemar Moore, , Alex Russell, , Kenny Johnson, , Jay Harrington
Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan
Cast: Stars:, John Krasinski, , Wendell Pierce, , Michael Kelly, , Abbie Cornish
Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Synopsis: Baltimore. New Year's Eve. A talented but troubled police officer (Shailene Woodley) is recruited by the FBI's chief investigator (Ben Mendelsohn) to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorizing the city.

Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Synopsis: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Synopsis: In the midst of an international crisis, Kate Wyler, a career diplomat, lands in a high-profile job for which she is not suited, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Synopsis: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

Cast: Stars:, Bryan Cranston, , Aaron Paul, , Anna Gunn, , Betsy Brandt
Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Title: The Diplomat

Synopsis: In the midst of an international crisis, Kate Wyler, a career diplomat, lands in a high-profile job for which she is not suited, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: Fake Profile

Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss

Title: The Mother
Cast: Director:, Niki Caro, | ,     Stars:, Jennifer Lopez, , Lucy Paez, , Omari Hardwick, , Joseph Fiennes
Synopsis: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson

Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon

Title: Manifest

Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon
Cast: Director:, Adrian Grunberg, | ,     Stars:, Omar Chaparro, , Bolivar Sanchez, , Carlos Solórzano, , Josh Lucas
Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Cast: Stars:, Shemar Moore, , Alex Russell, , Kenny Johnson, , Jay Harrington
Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan
Cast: Stars:, John Krasinski, , Wendell Pierce, , Michael Kelly, , Abbie Cornish
Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Title: Supernatural
Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Title: To Catch a Killer
Cast: Director:, Damián Szifron, | ,     Stars:, Shailene Woodley, , Ben Mendelsohn, , Jovan Adepo, , Ralph Ineson
Synopsis: Baltimore. New Year's Eve. A talented but troubled police officer (Shailene Woodley) is recruited by the FBI's chief investigator (Ben Mendelsohn) to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorizing the city.

Title: Missing
Cast: Directors:, Nicholas D. Johnson, , Will Merrick, | ,     Stars:, Tim Griffin, , Ava Zaria Lee, , Nia Long, , Kimberly Cheng
Synopsis: After her mother goes missing, a young woman tries to find her from home, using tools available to her online.

Title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
Cast: Stars:, Mariska Hargitay, , Christopher Meloni, , Ice-T, , Dann Florek
Synopsis: This series follows the Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of detectives in the New York City Police Department that investigate sexually related crimes.

Title: NCIS
Cast: Stars:, David McCallum, , Sean Murray, , Mark Harmon, , Brian Dietzen
Synopsis: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team.

Title: True Detective
Cast: Stars:, Vince Vaughn, , Colin Farrell, , Rachel McAdams, , Taylor Kitsch
Synopsis: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

Title: X
Cast: Director:, Ti West, | ,     Stars:, Mia Goth, , Jenna Ortega, , Brittany Snow, , Kid Cudi
Synopsis: In 1979, a group of young filmmakers set out to make an adult film in rural Texas, but when their reclusive, elderly hosts catch them in the act, the cast find themselves fighting for their lives.

Title: Kandahar
Cast: Director:, Ric Roman Waugh, | ,     Stars:, Gerard Butler, , Navid Negahban, , Ali Fazal, , Bahador Foladi
Synopsis: A CIA operative and his translator flee from special forces in Afghanistan after exposing a covert mission.

Synopsis: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day.

Title: Criminal Minds
Cast: Stars:, Kirsten Vangsness, , Matthew Gray Gubler, , A.J. Cook, , Joe Mantegna
Synopsis: A group of criminal profilers who work for the FBI as members of its Behavioral Analysis Unit (BAU) using behavioral analysis and profiling to help investigate crimes and find the suspect known as the unsub.

Cast: Director:, Justine Triet, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Swann Arlaud, , Milo Machado Graner, , Antoine Reinartz
Synopsis: A woman is suspected of her husband's murder, and their blind son faces a moral dilemma as the sole witness.

Title: The Clearing

Synopsis: A woman is forced to confront the nightmares of her past in order to stop a secret cult intent on gathering children to fulfil its master plan.

Title: Severance
Cast: Stars:, Adam Scott, , Zach Cherry, , Britt Lower, , Tramell Tillman
Synopsis: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

Title: Influencer
Cast: Director:, Kurtis David Harder, | ,     Stars:, Emily Tennant, , Rory J Saper, , Cassandra Naud, , Justin Sams
Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Garner, , Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, , Angourie Rice, , Aisha Tyler

Title: Inside Man
Cast: Stars:, David Tennant, , Stanley Tucci, , Dolly Wells, , Lydia West
Synopsis: A prisoner on death row in the US and a woman trapped in a cellar under an English vicarage, cross paths in the most unexpected way.

Synopsis: In the next installment, the survivors of the Ghostface killings leave Woodsboro behind and start a fresh chapter in New York City.

Title: The Wire
Cast: Stars:, Dominic West, , Lance Reddick, , Sonja Sohn, , Wendell Pierce
Synopsis: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

Title: Lost
Cast: Stars:, Jorge Garcia, , Josh Holloway, , Yunjin Kim, , Evangeline Lilly
Synopsis: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

Title: Severance
Cast: Stars:, Adam Scott, , Zach Cherry, , Britt Lower, , Tramell Tillman
Synopsis: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives. When a mysterious colleague appears outside of work, it begins a journey to discover the truth about their jobs.

Title: Influencer
Cast: Director:, Kurtis David Harder, | ,     Stars:, Emily Tennant, , Rory J Saper, , Cassandra Naud, , Justin Sams
Synopsis: While struggling on a solo backpacking trip in Thailand, social media influencer Madison meets CW, who travels with ease and shows her a more uninhibited way of living, but CW's interest in her takes a darker turn.

Title: The Last Thing He Told Me
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Garner, , Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, , Angourie Rice, , Aisha Tyler
Synopsis: A woman forms an unexpected relationship with her 16-year-old stepdaughter while searching for the truth about why her husband has mysteriously disappeared.

Title: Inside Man
Cast: Stars:, David Tennant, , Stanley Tucci, , Dolly Wells, , Lydia West
Synopsis: A prisoner on death row in the US and a woman trapped in a cellar under an English vicarage, cross paths in the most unexpected way.

Title: FUBAR
Cast: Stars:, Arnold Schwarzenegger, , Monica Barbaro, , Milan Carter, , Gabriel Luna
Synopsis: A C.I.A. operative on the edge of retirement discovers a family secret and is called back into the field for one last job.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Cast: Director:, Chad Stahelski, | ,     Stars:, Keanu Reeves, , Laurence Fishburne, , George Georgiou, , Lance Reddick
Synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Fast X
Cast: Director:, Louis Leterrier, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jason Statham, , Jordana Brewster
Synopsis: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

Title: Yellowjackets
Cast: Stars:, Melanie Lynskey, , Tawny Cypress, , Sophie Nélisse, , Jasmin Savoy Brown
Synopsis: A wildly talented high school girl soccer team becomes the (un)lucky survivors of a plane crash deep in the Canadian wilderness.

Title: From
Cast: Stars:, Scott McCord, , Harold Perrineau, , Catalina Sandino Moreno, , Eion Bailey
Synopsis: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normalcy and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

Title: Love & Death
Cast: Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jesse Plemons, , Lily Rabe, , Patrick Fugit
Synopsis: Two churchgoing couples enjoy small town family life in Texas - until somebody picks up an axe.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Citadel
Cast: Stars:, Richard Madden, , Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Stanley Tucci, , Ashleigh Cummings
Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Title: Black Mirror
Cast: Stars:, Daniel Lapaine, , Hannah John-Kamen, , Michaela Coel, , Beatrice Robertson-Jones
Synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

Title: Hypnotic
Cast: Director:, Robert Rodriguez, | ,     Stars:, Ben Affleck, , Alice Braga, , JD Pardo, , Dayo Okeniyi
Synopsis: A detective investigates a mystery involving his missing daughter and a secret government program.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: The Covenant
Cast: Director:, Guy Ritchie, | ,     Stars:, Jake Gyllenhaal, , Dar Salim, , Sean Sagar, , Jason Wong
Synopsis: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: The Boogeyman
Cast: Director:, Rob Savage, | ,     Stars:, Sophie Thatcher, , Chris Messina, , Vivien Lyra Blair, , David Dastmalchian
Synopsis: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

Title: Breaking Bad
Cast: Stars:, Bryan Cranston, , Aaron Paul, , Anna Gunn, , Betsy Brandt
Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Title: The Diplomat
Cast: Stars:, Keri Russell, , Rufus Sewell, , David Gyasi, , Ali Ahn
Synopsis: In the midst of an international crisis, Kate Wyler, a career diplomat, lands in a high-profile job for which she is not suited, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

Title: The Blacklist
Cast: Stars:, James Spader, , Megan Boone, , Diego Klattenhoff, , Ryan Eggold
Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Title: The Walking Dead
Cast: Stars:, Andrew Lincoln, , Norman Reedus, , Melissa McBride, , Lauren Cohan
Synopsis: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

Title: The Mother
Cast: Director:, Niki Caro, | ,     Stars:, Jennifer Lopez, , Lucy Paez, , Omari Hardwick, , Joseph Fiennes
Synopsis: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: Stranger Things
Cast: Stars:, Millie Bobby Brown, , Finn Wolfhard, , Winona Ryder, , David Harbour
Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Title: Tin & Tina
Cast: Director:, Rubin Stein, | ,     Stars:, Milena Smit, , Jaime Lorente, , Carlos González Morollón, , Anastasia Russo
Synopsis: After a tragic abort, Lola and her husband Adolfo adopt Tin and Tina, two lovely brother and sister with an ultra-catholic education that makes them interpret Holy Bible verbatim.

Title: The Black Demon
Cast: Director:, Adrian Grunberg, | ,     Stars:, Omar Chaparro, , Bolivar Sanchez, , Carlos Solórzano, , Josh Lucas
Synopsis: Stranded on a crumbling rig in Baja, a family faces off against a vengeful megalodon shark.

Title: Manifest
Cast: Stars:, Melissa Roxburgh, , Josh Dallas, , J.R. Ramirez, , Luna Blaise
Synopsis: When a commercial airliner suddenly reappears after being missing for five years, those aboard must reintegrate into society.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Cast: Stars:, Shemar Moore, , Alex Russell, , Kenny Johnson, , Jay Harrington
Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: Jack Ryan
Cast: Stars:, John Krasinski, , Wendell Pierce, , Michael Kelly, , Abbie Cornish
Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Cast: Stars:, Jared Padalecki, , Jensen Ackles, , Jim Beaver, , Misha Collins
Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Synopsis: Baltimore. New Year's Eve. A talented but troubled police officer (Shailene Woodley) is recruited by the FBI's chief investigator (Ben Mendelsohn) to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorizing the city.

Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Synopsis: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Synopsis: In the midst of an international crisis, Kate Wyler, a career diplomat, lands in a high-profile job for which she is not suited, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins

Title: Fake Profile
Cast: Stars:, Carolina Miranda, , Rodolfo Salas, , Juanse Díez, , Manuela González
Synopsis: Camila creates a sexy profile on the online dating app Spice looking for the man of her dreams. But her dreams quickly turn into nightmares, and Camila ends up falling into a web of sex, lies, and deception.

Title: Fatal Attraction
Cast: Stars:, Joshua Jackson, , Lizzy Caplan, , Amanda Peet, , Toby Huss
Synopsis: A deep-dive reimagining of the classic 80's thriller, exploring timeless themes of marriage and infidelity through the lens of modern attitudes toward strong women, personality disorders and coercive control.

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.
